languages.text: {n}Беженцы один за другим падают на колени.{/n} "Помилуйте нас! Всего пара дураков кричали всякое! Мы им уже и сами... чтоб рот не раззевали. Это они от горя и страха, правда... Не наказывайте всех за это!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Беженцы один за другим падают на колени.{/n} "Помилуйте нас! Всего пара дураков кричали всякое! Мы им уже и сами... чтоб рот не раззевали. Это они от горя и страха, правда... Не наказывайте всех за это!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few idiots shouted some things, that's all! We shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"
languages.original_text: {n}Беженцы один за другим падают на колени.{/n} "Помилуйте нас! Всего пара дураков кричали всякое! Мы им уже и сами... чтоб рот не раззевали. Это они от горя и страха, правда... Не наказывайте всех за это!"

traits.locale_text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few of our idiots were shouting some things, that's all! We've shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

traits.locale_text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few idiots shouted some things, that's all! We shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}ひとり、またひとりと、難民たちは膝に崩れ落ちた。{/n}「お、お許しください！何人かの愚か者が口を滑らせただけです！すぐに私どもの方で黙らせました。喪失感の恐怖に飲まれて口走ってしまったのでしょう…どうか残りの者たちは罰しないでください！」
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few idiots shouted some things, that's all! We shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ひとり、またひとりと、難民たちは膝に崩れ落ちた。{/n}「お、お許しください！何人かの愚か者が口を滑らせただけです！すぐに私どもの方で黙らせました。喪失感の恐怖に飲まれて口走ってしまったのでしょう…どうか残りの者たちは罰しないでください！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}难民们一个接一个地跪了下来。{/n}“请发发慈悲吧！那只是几个蠢货在胡说八道，仅此而已！我们已经把他们关起来了，他们是太难过、太恐惧，才会说出那样的胡话……请不要因此惩罚我们其他人！”
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few idiots shouted some things, that's all! We shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}难民们一个接一个地跪了下来。{/n}“请发发慈悲吧！那只是几个蠢货在胡说八道，仅此而已！我们已经把他们关起来了，他们是太难过、太恐惧，才会说出那样的胡话……请不要因此惩罚我们其他人！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}Los refugiados, uno a uno, caen de rodillas.{/n} «¡Tenga piedad, se lo suplico! ¡Los de los insultos solo han sido unos pocos! Ya nos hemos encargado de cerrarles el pico. Lo hicieron por pena y miedo... ¡No nos castigue al resto!».
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few idiots shouted some things, that's all! We shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los refugiados, uno a uno, caen de rodillas.{/n} «¡Tenga piedad, se lo suplico! ¡Los de los insultos solo han sido unos pocos! Ya nos hemos encargado de cerrarles el pico. Lo hicieron por pena y miedo... ¡No nos castigue al resto!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}Un par un, les réfugiés tombent à genoux.{/n} « Je vous en supplie, ayez pitié ! Ce ne sont que quelques imbéciles qui hurlaient, c'est tout ! Nous les avons déjà fait taire. Ils ne faisaient qu'exprimer leur chagrin et leur peur... Ne nous faites pas payer à leur place ! »
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few idiots shouted some things, that's all! We shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un par un, les réfugiés tombent à genoux.{/n} « Je vous en supplie, ayez pitié ! Ce ne sont que quelques imbéciles qui hurlaient, c'est tout ! Nous les avons déjà fait taire. Ils ne faisaient qu'exprimer leur chagrin et leur peur... Ne nous faites pas payer à leur place ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}Die Flüchtlinge sinken der Reihe nach auf die Knie.{/n} "Bitte habt Gnade! Ein paar Idioten haben etwas gerufen, das ist alles! Wir haben ihnen schon selbst den Mund gestopft. Aus ihnen sprachen Kummer und Furcht ... Bitte bestraft dafür nicht den Rest von uns!"
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few idiots shouted some things, that's all! We shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Flüchtlinge sinken der Reihe nach auf die Knie.{/n} "Bitte habt Gnade! Ein paar Idioten haben etwas gerufen, das ist alles! Wir haben ihnen schon selbst den Mund gestopft. Aus ihnen sprachen Kummer und Furcht ... Bitte bestraft dafür nicht den Rest von uns!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: {n}Sığınmacılar birer birer diz çöküyor.{/n} "Yalvarırız, acıyın bize! Birkaç aptalın zırvaları işte! Zaten çenelerini kapattık. Korkudan ve kederden ne dediklerini bilmiyorlardı. Kurunun yanında yaşı da yakmayın!"
languages.original_text: {n}One by one, the refugees fall to their knees.{/n} "Please, have mercy! A few idiots shouted some things, that's all! We shut them up ourselves already. It was their grief and fear talking... Please don't punish the rest of us for it!"

traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld
